short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play Stealing the Diamond game on Chrome™ Browser! You can also play for free at gamecomets.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
In the thrilling world of point-and-click adventures, Stealing the Diamond emerges as a standout entry in the beloved Henry Stickmin series. This game transports players into the audacious life of Henry Stickmin, a daring jewel thief with his sights set on a grand prize: a priceless diamond housed within a well-guarded museum.

The excitement in Stealing the Diamond is rooted in its core gameplay mechanic—choice. Each decision you make not only propels the story forward but also branches it into wildly different directions, illustrating the butterfly effect in a fun, engaging way. As players navigate through the museum, they are faced with a series of decisions that determine whether Henry succeeds in his audacious heist or fails in humorous, often spectacular fashion.

If you have any questions about our Stealing the Diamond game extension or just want to give us some feedback, feel free to send us a message or write a review! We'd love to hear from you. You can mouse over to Support tab on the extension, then click on "visit the developer's support site" to contact us.
